column1: Smoque BBQ////Took my parents and middle son here for the best BBQ chicago has to offer and it didn't disappoint at all!  Once again
column2: had the spicy ass BBQ Gumbo - yes
column3: I said BBQ gumbo - which is incredible!  The beans are incredible
column5: and the Carolina sauce insatiable!  Want BBQ in Chicago?  Kill yourself if you go elsewhere!  Lol
